name: Walk (Guyonyourleft)
description:
"The climate crisis is a leadership crisis. For far too long, far too many leaders have been focused on profit, power, and prestige; and many of those committed to change have been ineffective" (All We Can Save, P.  14).

This is a choose-your-own-adventure that takes you on a journey in San Francisco. This game is filled with recorded sounds and images from throughout San Francisco. Explore the beauty of San Francisco, and walk along great locations within this great city. Reconnect with nature and ponder the effects of climate change. Follow our character and find out why he is walking. 

This game is built with HTML 5, CSS, and JavaScript, using Twine Sugar cube. 

Game by Junle Yuan
